data.comment: Today's referee, Erik Lambrechts, has blown to start the match.
Genk take a 0-1 lead thanks to Theo Bongonda.
In the minute 4, Great play from Junya Ito to set up the goal.
Ibrahima Sory Sankhon (St. Truidense) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
Yuma Suzuki levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 28, Oleksandr Filippov with an assist there.
It seems as if Dries Wouters is unable to continue. Kristian Thorstvedt replaces him for the away team.
Theo Bongonda scores to make it 1-2 at Staaien.
In the minute 41, At Staaien, Pol Garcia has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 49, Genk's Kristian Thorstvedt has been booked in Sint- Truiden.
Steve De Ridder (St. Truidense) has received a first yellow card.
Tatsuya Ito is on a sub for Ibrahima Sory Sankhon for St. Truidense.
In the minute 73, Domenico Olivieri (Genk) is making a second substitution, with Bryan Heynen replacing Patrik Hrosovsky.
Facundo Colidio is replacing Duckens Nazon for St. Truidense at Staaien.
Theo Bongonda (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Kevin Muscat is making the team's third substitution at Staaien with Seung-Woo Lee replacing Samuel Asamoah.
Kouassi Eboue is replacing Paul Onuachu for the away team.
Maximiliano Caufriez for St. Truidense has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Steve De Ridder has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
